sentence.Network_en: Some children have more finely trained perceptual skills than others.
sentence.Network_cn: 一些孩子比其他孩子具备更为训练有素的感知技能。

sentence.Network_en: Some children come to school with more finely trained perceptual skills than others.
sentence.Network_cn: 一些孩子在入学时比其他孩子受过更好的感知技能培养。

sentence.Network_en: When multiple saturated colors are used together , chromostereopsis and other perceptual artifacts often occur.
sentence.Network_cn: 当使用多种饱和色时,经常出现多彩立体影像和其他视觉假象.

entry.def: Perceptual means relating to the way people interpret and understand what they see or notice.

example.ex: Some children have more finely trained perceptual skills than others.
example.tran: 一些孩子比其他孩子具备更为训练有素的感知技能。

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to the act of perceiving;
